title: PANDEMO 350 Mountain E-Bike
text: Well established on the South African market, we proudly offer the Pandemo 350 mountain e-bike. Its great features include 6 different assistance settings, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, and driven through Shimano 21-speed gear set system. A bright LED light and illuminated LCD screen facilitates night cycling. The electronic system provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption.Great handling characteristics: Improved steering is achieved through a 680mm handlebar, and you’ll always feel safe on these great bikes knowing that Tektro 160 front and rear disks are fitted!Value for money: The standard accessories included are a removable 36v long-lasting battery, bike kickstand, reflectors, bottle cradle, a USB charging port for your mobile device, and spring loaded throttle switch.It is available in 3 different sizes to suit all cyclists, male or female. Great e-bikes and scooters from SA Ebikes. Call Kobus at 0764245136 or visit our website at www.saebikes.co.za for more information, and to place your order now!We deliver countrywide.Chubby bag and waterbottle excluded.
location: Airport industria, Cape Flats, Western Cape

title: Cycle Science Westville- Bicycle service and repair shop
text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables. 

Contact
Jason at Cycle Science
0815310901
1 Link road, Westville.

https://cyclescience.business.site/

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. title: Trek Roscoe 8 Mountain Bike
text:
Trek Roscoe 8 - Large Frame


Bike is in great condition. It has barely been ridden. Has been standing for a long time, and just had a full service done at BSC, who specialise in Trek. 

Bike is 100% original. 

The perfect hardtail with wide 27.5 inch tyres to inspire confidence on the trails. One of the few hardtails in this class with a dropper post as standard. Beautiful bike, sad to be selling.. but I don’t get enough use out of it. 

Specs: 

Frame 
Alpha Gold Aluminum, E2 tapered head tube, internal derailleur & dropper post routing, rack & kickstand mount, Boost141, G2 Geometry 

Fork 
RockShox Judy Silver TK, Solo Air spring, preload, rebound, TurnKey hydraulic lockout, E2 tapered steerer, G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, Boost110, 120mm travel (13.5: 100mm travel) 

Bottom Bracket 
Sealed cartridge 

Headset 
Semi-integrated, 1-1/8˝ top, 1.5˝ bottom 

Stem 
Bontrager Rhythm Comp, 31.8mm, 0 degree 

Handlebar 
Bontrager alloy, 31.8mm, 15mm rise 

Saddle 
Bontrager Evoke 1.5 Women's 

Seatpost 
Dropper post, Bontrager lever, 31.6mm, internal routing 

Pedals 
Shimano 

Grips 
Bontrager Race Lite, lock-on 

Rear Derailleur 
SRAM NX, Roller Bearing Clutch 

Crank 
SRAM NX, 28T Direct Mount X-Sync 

Shifters 
SRAM NX, 11 speed 

Cassette 
SRAM PG-1130, 11-42, 11 speed 

Brakes 
Shimano M315 hydraulic disc 

Tires 
Schwalbe Rocket Ron Performance 

The bike can fit both 27.5 and 29 inch tyre sizes, however the standard size for this bike is 27.5. 

Send me a message on WhatsApp if you are interested.

text:
Scott Fuga Rev MTB Helmet in excellent like new condition, used only a few times. Neat, barely any signs of use.

This helmet retails at over R2.5k!

Description "Fuga Plus 2021 Cycling Helmet"

Perfect helmet for high demands in cyclocross and road cycling. This helmet is characterised by MIPS brain protection system, Halo 3D adjustment system and an unparalleled ventilation. The removable visor changes your look when needed for MTB or road biking.

light and stable In-Mold construction with light Polycarbonate Microshell outer shell

the integrated MIPS protection system absorbs and dispenses rotational forces in case of a diagonal impact Convincing protection from traumatic brain injuries!

very good ventilation thanks to inside air flow channels and large holes in front and back

excellent comfort due to innovative HALO one-hand adjustment system which allows for easy individual adjustment to the shape of your head

bacteriostatic X-Static liner pads

removable visor

reflective sticker

sizes: M (55-59), L (59-61)

weight: 280 g (size M)

DELIVERY/MEET-UP CAN BE ARRANGED.

title: Cycle Science Westville- Bicycle service and repair shop
text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables. 

Contact

title: Thule ClipOn3 *LIKE NEW*
text:
Retails for R3000+ at major retailer, you can get it in almost new condition for only R2000.

Thule's Clip On 9104 Bike Rack ia an easy-to-use, hanging-style trunk bike rack designed for station wagons and hatchbacks and will store 3 bikes with relative ease. It is easily mountable due to Thule's unique snap-on system and the rubber coated components ensure that your bike and car paint will not be damaged by this bike rack in any way.

Key Features:
- All parts in contact with the car and bikes are coated with rubber for extra protection.
- Easy to mount to the rear door with a unique snap-on system.
- Quickly folds for easy storage.
- Possible to attach Thule Light board 976.
- Use Thule Bike Frame Adapter 982 for fitting of bikes with non-standard frames (e.g. ladies’ bikes, BMXs, downhill bikes)
- This product does not have universal fit and it comes in two versions (9103 and 9104) having different tube diameters fitting different car models
- Max load capacity is 45kg with each bike weighing in at a maximum of 15kg each
- Dimensions(cm): 57 x 82 x 116 (Folded: 57 x 18 x 117)
- Weight: 7.1kg

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: New Santa Cruz grips for sale
text: DESCRIPTIONDesigned and tested by us, the Palmdale Grips are the new home for your hands on Santa Cruz Bicycles.Single lock-ring design with the staying power of dual lock-ring. A taper-lock core uses an internal sleeve that narrows towards the last 38mm (1.5”) of the grip, effectively clamping onto the end of the bar to eliminate twisting.Flared closed end for comfort, feel and security. 8mm (0.3”) of rubber with a subtle mushroom profile on the tip resists scuffing, provides comfort and adds an intuitive feel for the bar end. (We also found it adds a healthy dose of forgiveness when clipping trees on tight trails!)Long grip length and waffle knurl for maximum control. A generous 125mm (4.9”) grip length (excluding lock-ring) allows plenty of room to reposition hands on differing terrain and long rides. The moto-knurl pattern gives just the right balance of feel and grip in all conditions.	R 300-00PIERRE  0726553812

title: Urbanlite e-ride adjustable helmet
text: Product description Rekd protection Urbanlite E-RideREKD have taken their Urbanlite helmet to the max with Urbanlite E-ride. Certified to NTA 8776, a safety standard designed especially for S-EPAC / E-bike riders, Urbanlite E-ride helmet is there to keep you safe whether you’re commuting to work or just out for a ride on your E-bike.- Urbanlite E-Ride is packed with premium features such as a FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle, allowing for super easy and stylish fastening, as well as their heat-stamped anti-bacterial padding and Twist-Fit Retention System to help you find the perfect fit. With safety-enhancing features such as a battery light with solid and flashing settings as the adjuster dial, as well as stickers and logos and reflective strips inside the straps, helping you become more visible to other road users in low light situations, Urbanlite E-ride is the ultimate Urban focussed helmet with E-bikes and road safety in mind.Features:- Heat stamped anti-bacterial lined padding- Reflective front and rear logos- Custom branded REKD Protection strap dividers- Light-up Twist-Fit Retention System for the perfect fit- 12 vent holes for optimum airflow- Built-in weather peak- FIDLOCK® magnetic buckle- Additional reflective stickers included- Certified for use with e-bikes- Suitable for a wide range of action sportsSpecifications:Construction and Materials:- High-density Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) inner core- Durable Polycarbonate (PC) outer shell- Hardwearing Nylon webbing strap with Nylon buckle- Anti-bacterial lined padding- Product Weight: 325gAt this moment, the product Rekd protection Urbanlite E-Ride is in stock at xtremeinn. Find out what other extreme sports products, the brand Rekd protection has at your online extreme sports store. Make any outfit your own with this season´s selection of Helmets models. At xtremeinn we stock the latest styles and designs of Protections. Browse through our selection and find the extreme sports item that suits your needs.R1,000 negotiable

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK8 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab.  You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: PANDEMO 350 Mountain E-Bike
text: Well established on the South African market, we proudly offer the Pandemo 350 mountain e-bike. Its great features include 6 different assistance settings, supplied by a powerful 350-watt motor housed in the rear wheel hub, and driven through Shimano 21-speed gear set system. A bright LED light and illuminated LCD screen facilitates night cycling. The electronic system provides essential cumulative and trip data including speed, distance, time, battery condition and instantaneous power consumption.Great handling characteristics: Improved steering is achieved through a 680mm handlebar, and you’ll always feel safe on these great bikes knowing that Tektro 160 front and rear disks are fitted!Value for money: The standard accessories included are a removable 36v long-lasting battery, bike kickstand, reflectors, bottle cradle, a USB charging port for your mobile device, and spring loaded throttle switch.It is available in 3 different sizes to suit all cyclists, male or female. Great e-bikes and scooters from SA Ebikes.
